sentences.en: Administrative measures to tamp down lending to overheated sectors such as real estate were also enacted.
sentences.cn: 此外,还颁布了限制房地产等过热行业贷款的行政措施.

sentences.en: Don't forget to tamp the hole well. Tamping is as important as the hole depth.
sentences.cn: 别忘了填井, 填井和井深一样重要.

sentences.en: Tamp the coffee grinds in the container to make espresso.
sentences.cn: 在容器中捣实咖啡粉来煮浓咖啡.

sentences.en: The old man tamped down the tobacco with his thumb.
sentences.cn: 老人用大拇指把烟叶压实。

sentences.en: Then I tamp down the soil with the back of a rake.
sentences.cn: 然后我用耙子的背将土壤拍实。

words.tran_cn: 篡改；干预；损害；削弱；玩弄；贿赂

trans.tran_en: to press or push something down by lightly hitting it several times

trans.tran_cn: 捣固，填充，（用炮泥）封炮眼口，夯实
